8005.name: Press the Attack
8005.description: Hitting an enemy champion 3 consecutive times deals bonus damage and amplifies your damage until you leave combat with champions.

8008.name: Lethal Tempo
8008.description: Attacking an enemy champion grants you Attack Speed, up to 6 stacks. At max stacks, deal <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'><font color='#48C4B7'>bonus adaptive damage</font></lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> On-Attack.

8009.name: Presence of Mind
8009.description: Restore a small amount of mana or energy when damaging an enemy champion. Takedowns restore mana or energy.

8010.name: Conqueror
8010.description: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.

8014.name: Coup de Grace
8014.description: Deal more damage to low health enemy champions.

8017.name: Cut Down
8017.description: Deal more damage to high health enemy champions.

8021.name: Fleet Footwork
8021.description: Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack heals you and grants increased <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.

8106.name: Ultimate Hunter
8106.description: Unique takedowns grant permanent cooldown reduction on your Ultimate.

8112.name: Electrocute
8112.description: Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities in 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.

8118.name: Deep Ward
8118.description: Stealth Wards and Totem Wards placed in the enemy jungle are considered Deep. All Deep wards are granted 1 bonus health, Deep Stealth Wards last 30-45 seconds longer, and Deep Totem Wards last 45-150 seconds longer. At level 9, wards placed in the river will also be considered Deep.

8120.name: Ghost Poro
8120.description: When your wards expire, they leave behind a Ghost Poro. The Ghost Poro grants vision until discovered. Gain permanent AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> for each Ghost Poro and when your Ghost Poro spots an enemy champion, plus bonus upon completion.

8126.name: Cheap Shot
8126.description: Deal bonus true damage to enemy champions with <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairAct'>impaired movement or actions</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.

8128.name: Dark Harvest
8128.description: Damaging a low health champion inflicts <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and harvests a soul from the victim.

8135.name: Treasure Hunter
8135.description: Unique takedowns grant additional gold the first time they are collected.

8134.name: Sixth Sense
8134.description: Upon moving near an un-tracked enemy ward, it is automatically tracked with a ward timer. At level 11, additionally reveals nearby enemy stealthed wards for 10 seconds upon being triggered. (250 second cooldown, 900 range)

8136.name: Zombie Ward
8136.description: <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>Takedowns</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> on enemy Wards cause friendly Zombie Wards to sprout from their corpses. Gain permanent AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> for each Zombie Ward spawned plus a bonus upon completion.

8138.name: Eyeball Collection
8138.description: Collect eyeballs for champion <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>takedowns</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>. Gain permanent AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> for each eyeball plus bonus upon collection completion.

8139.name: Taste of Blood
8139.description: Heal when you damage an enemy champion.

8140.name: Grisly Mementos
8140.description: Gain 6 trinket haste per Memento stack, up to 108 haste at maximum stacks. Earn a Memento stack whenever scoring a champion takedown, up to 18 stacks. In modes where wards are not available, each stack permanently grants 3 summoner spell haste instead, up to 54.

8143.name: Sudden Impact
8143.description: Damaging basic attacks and abilities deal bonus true damage to enemy champions after using a dash, leap, blink, teleport, or when leaving stealth.

8210.name: Transcendence
8210.description:
Gain bonuses upon reaching the following levels:
Level 5: +5 Ability Haste
Level 8: +5 Ability Haste
Level 11: On Champion takedown, reduce the remaining cooldown of basic abilities by 20%.

8214.name: Summon Aery
8214.description: Your attacks and abilities send Aery to a target, damaging enemies or shielding allies.

8224.name: Nullifying Orb
8224.description: Gain a magic damage shield when taken to low health by magic damage.

8226.name: Manaflow Band
8226.description:
Hitting an enemy champion with an ability permanently increases your maximum mana by 25, up to 250 mana.

After reaching 250 bonus mana, restore 1% of your missing mana every 5 seconds.

8229.name: Arcane Comet
8229.description: Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a damaging comet at their location.

8230.name: Phase Rush
8230.description: Hitting an enemy champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities grants a burst of MS and Slow Resist.

8232.name: Waterwalking
8232.description: Gain <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and AP or AD, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> in the river.

8233.name: Absolute Focus
8233.description: While above 70% health, gain extra <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.

8234.name: Celerity
8234.description: All <speed>Move Speed</speed> bonuses are 7% more effective on you and gain <speed>1% Move Speed</speed>.

8236.name: Gathering Storm
8236.description: Gain increasing amounts of AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> over the course of the game.

8237.name: Scorch
8237.description: Your first damaging ability hit every 10s burns champions.

8242.name: Unflinching
8242.description: Gain Armor and Magic Resist when receiving crowd control.

8275.name: Nimbus Cloak
8275.description: After casting a Summoner Spell, gain a short <speed>Move Speed</speed> increase that allows you to pass through units.

8299.name: Last Stand
8299.description: Deal more damage to champions while you are low on health.

8304.name: Magical Footwear
8304.description: You get free boots at 12 min but you cannot buy boots before then. Each <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>takedown</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> you get makes your boots come 45s sooner.

8306.name: Hextech Flashtraption
8306.description:
While Flash is on cooldown it is replaced by Hexflash.

Hexflash: Channel, then blink to a new location.

8313.name: Triple Tonic
8313.description:
Upon reaching level 3, gain an Elixir of Avarice.
Upon reaching level 6, gain an Elixir of Force.
Upon reaching level 9, gain an Elixir of Skill.

8315.name: Axiom Arcanist
8315.description: Your ultimate has 12% increased damage (reduced to 8% for area of effect abilities), healing and shielding. Scoring an enemy champion takedown reduces your ultimate ability's current cooldown by 7%.

8316.name: Jack Of All Trades
8316.description:
For each different stat gained from items, gain one Jack stack. Each stack grants you 1 Ability Haste.

Gain bonus Adaptive Force at 5 and 10 stacks.

8321.name: Cash Back
8321.description: Get some gold back when you purchase Legendary Items.

8345.name: Biscuit Delivery
8345.description: Gain a free Biscuit every 2 min, until 6 min. Consuming or selling a Biscuit permanently increases your max health and restores health.

8351.name: Glacial Augment
8351.description: Immobilizing an enemy champion will cause 3 glacial rays that slow nearby enemies and reduce their damage to your allies.

8360.name: Unsealed Spellbook
8360.description: Swap Summoner Spells while out of combat. Swapping to unique Summoner Spells will increase the rate at which you can make future swaps.

8369.name: First Strike
8369.description: When you initiate champion combat, deal 7% extra damage for 3 seconds and gain gold based on damage dealt.

8401.name: Shield Bash
8401.description: Whenever you gain a shield, your next basic attack against a champion deals bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'><font color='#48C4B7'>adaptive</font></lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> damage.

8410.name: Approach Velocity
8410.description: Bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> towards nearby enemy champions that are <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairMov'>movement impaired</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>, increased for enemy champions that you impair.

8429.name: Conditioning
8429.description: After 12 min gain +8 Armor and +8 Magic Resist and increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 3%.

8437.name: Grasp of the Undying
8437.description: Every 4s your next attack on a champion deals bonus magic damage, heals you, and permanently increases your health.

8439.name: Aftershock
8439.description: After <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Immobilize'>immobilizing</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> an enemy champion gain defenses and later deal a burst of magic damage around you.

8444.name: Second Wind
8444.description: After taking damage from an enemy champion heal back some missing health over time.

8446.name: Demolish
8446.description: Charge up a powerful attack against a tower while near it.

8451.name: Overgrowth
8451.description: Gain permanent max health when minions or monsters die near you.

8453.name: Revitalize
8453.description:
Gain 5% Heal and Shield Power.

Heals and shields you cast or receive are 10% stronger on targets below 40% health.

8463.name: Font of Life
8463.description: <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairMov'>Impairing</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> the movement of an enemy champion heals nearby allied champions.

8465.name: Guardian
8465.description: Guard allies you cast spells on and those that are very nearby. If you or a guarded ally would take damage based on level, you're both granted a shield.

8473.name: Bone Plating
8473.description:
After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal 30-60 (based on level) less damage.

Duration: 1.5s
Cooldown: 55s

9103.name: Legend: Bloodline
9103.description: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Life Steal, up to a cap. Once the cap is reached, increase your max health. Weaker earlier but stronger later game than other Legend Runes.

9105.name: Legend: Haste
9105.description: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Basic Ability Haste.

9111.name: Triumph
9111.description: <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>Takedowns</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> restore 5% of your missing health and grant an additional 20 gold.

9923.name: Hail of Blades
9923.description: Gain a large amount of Attack Speed for the first 3 attacks made against enemy champions.
